label: Cur Topics in FS & Human Nutr
description: Group discussion or an experimental course on a special topic in food science and human nutrition. 1 to 3 undergraduate hours. 1 to 3 graduate hours. May be repeated in the same or subsequent terms to a maximum of 12 hours as topics vary.
courseSectionInformation: 1 to 3 undergraduate hours. 1 to 3 graduate hours. May be repeated in the same or subsequent terms to a maximum of 12 hours as topics vary.
classScheduleInformation: There may be a fee for Class Materials for some sections of this course.
